name: Silver Fern Rotorua - Accommodation and Spa

reviews.title: Great place to stay
reviews.text: Visiting Rotorua from Australia. Thoroughly enjoyed both the area and this very high quality motel. We found it to clean and comfortable with every possible amenity that you could wish for. The Silver Fern has large bright rooms. Our suite had a separate lounge area with a comfortable couch, a well equipped kitchen area and a beautiful spa bathroom. Averything is high quality with even a separate flat screen television in both the lounge area and the bedroom. The hosts are friendly and informative and the breakfasts lovely. Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel is located a couple of kilometres from the centre of Rotorua and the lake, however we didn't think you would need to be any closer. The room was large, clean and well appointed. The kitchenette was a real benefit and the owners were very helpful giving us a number of ideas to make the most of our short stay.
reviews.title: Comfortable large motel room

reviews.text: Great service, friendly staff and nice rooms with spa. I stayed 4 nights with my wife - originally going to be 3 nights but we extended it because it was so lovely. Each room has a private spa bath. They lend DVDs for us to watch each night. Very enjoyable! Also each room has free wifi.
reviews.title: Great accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Silver Fern for 3 nights in April 2013. Really great accommodation. Spacious rooms, nice bathroom, lovely spa. The normal management wasn't there when we were there, but even the fill in management were more then lovely, always going out of there way to help. Even drove us to the airport free of charge. We found that the location wasn't the best because there wasn't many places to eat nearby that was easy walking distance, especially since it was raining during out stay. But the motel itself was lovely and highly recommend anyone to stay there.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Stay

reviews.text: Stayed for one night, and a can't speak highly enough of the management. They were very helpful, and kindly offered to drive us to dinner. The double suite was fabulous which was very spacious for the 4 of us. It also included a wonderful large spa. A place I will return to.
reviews.title: Well recommended...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very neat and clean property managed by a beautiful couple Allan & Shirley. We had most of the interaction with Allan during our two day stay here. As we approached the place, we had mixed feelings. The property was just outside the main area. Property has not many rooms and they are doing a good job managing it. He was quite helpful in checking in as we approached. The room was quite spacious with spacious spa wash room. Bed and towels were best out of the hotels we stayed in NZ. We particularly liked the jacuzzi bath tub. He helped us in planning the two day trip quite well and we did as he suggested. Now i check we covered most of the places. He also provided us with discount coupon for Geysers which was quite close to this property. Few very big departmental stores are near by for your grocery needs. Very calm place. We also went to see market which is held on main street only on Tuesdays.
reviews.title: Nice place at good location

reviews.text: We (2 adults & 2 children) stayed at Silver Fern Rotorua after reading the positive reviews on trip advisor and overall were very happy with our choice. The service was very friendly and helpful and the rooms neat and tidy (even if the furniture wasn't exactly contemporary). The kitchen was well stocked and fresh milk was provided to us on check-in. The DVD library at reception was a nice touch and our 5 year old had lots of fun choosing which movies to watch! As for us adults loved the free Wi-Fi! Overall highly recommended and would stay here if we came to Rotorua again.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location near the centre of Rotorua and close to all the major attractions. The rooms are spacious, and I would definitely recommend getting the rooms with the hot tub. The rooms are spacious, and the staff very friendly and helpful. They can provide tourist information and help book trips if needed. They also had DVD's that could that could be borrowed.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location!

reviews.text: We stayed in rotorua for one night. Silver Fern was a good choice for us. The service was helpful, and reception had a selection of DVD's to borrow free. We didn't end up making use of the private heated spa in our room but imagine it would be nice! Only negative was when we tried to do some laundry and the drier didn't work, however the owner got it going for us eventually.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rotorua was the initial leg of our NZ honeymoon, and our decision to stay at Silver Fern was just perfect! We booked a standard studio room and got upgraded to a Superior Studio Suite on our arrival, as they told us we'll get more privacy on the first floor. Nice touch.
reviews.title: Homey motel in quaint Rotorua

reviews.text: We stayed for 2 nights in a family room spa suite. We would highly recommend this Motel! Managers couldn't do enough for us - warm and friendly with great local knowledge.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay - 5 star service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The family room was very well designed - separate room for the kid's, spa bath, large fluffy towels. It felt like a home away from home!
reviews.title: Great Little Hotel.....Will Definitely Go Back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we will stay again on our next trip to New Zealand. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: We stayed in the silver fern accommodation March last year and received a really lovely welcome. The accommodation was really spacious and was situated in a really central location - perfect! This was the last accommodation of our 2 week break in New Zealand and I feel we left the best til last.
reviews.title: Great place to visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really liked the fact that the team were really helpful with the local attractions and I thought it was a great touch to have a communal DVD library. Especially enjoyed watching the Lord of the rings trilogy.
reviews.title: Top facilities, beautiful room & helpful friendly management

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 3 nights while holidaying & taking in the sights & Smells of the area. Bedroom had it's own tv and heater away from main living area. Kitchen, lounge, 2 single lounge seats & a table with 4 chairs plus dvd & tv all in main area gave a home feel. Bathroom had large spa bath with shower & good size basin with nice toiletries & quality towels. Outside on the deck was another set of table & chairs.
reviews.title: Clean & well Kept

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was delivered to our room & was as ordered & not overpriced.
reviews.title: Some very good things and some not so good......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Did find the spa a bit of an effort to get in & out of if only wanting to take a quick shower, floor tiles on steps a bit slippery when wet.
reviews.title: "Happy to stay here again"

reviews.text: Plenty of other motels in the same street of varying quality & price we chose the Silver Fern based on other reports and were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Great motel with all you need

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Alan was a good host, always genial. The motel was clean and well presented, the bed comfortable. Rotorua has a sulphur stench that takes a bit of getting used to. The location of this motel is on Fenton street, which is a long drag, with multiple motels - this one is a good twenty minute walk into town. Our suite was on a corner and so the lounge seemed to be cut down in size and difficult to furnish. The bathroom was huge - dominated by a large deep spa - unfortunately the shower was over this - and difficult to get in and out of.
reviews.title: Right up to expectations - will book again.

description: Silver Fern Accommodation and Spa offers superior, quality Rotorua accommodation which is ideally situated on Fenton Street. The Silver Fern is just minutes from Rotorua’s city centre and amenities, cafe and restaurants, golf course and world famous thermal attractions.
